entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:43 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
